languages.text: "Мне ужасно неловко, Звездн{mf|ый|ая} Госпо{mf|дин|жа}. Простите, что оскорбила ваш слух!" {n}Вспыхнув от стыда, прячет глаза Мейв.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Мне ужасно неловко, звездн{mf|ый|ая} госпо{mf|дин|жа}. Простите, что оскорбила ваш слух!" {n}Вспыхнув от стыда, прячет глаза служанка.{/n}

languages.text: "Oh, how embarrassing! My Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}, I apologise for offending your ears!" {n}Cheeks burning with shame, Maive casts her eyes down.{/n}

languages.text: “噢，这真是太让人难堪了！我很抱歉冒犯了您的耳朵，来自上界的大人！”{n}梅芙羞愧得两颊发烫，垂下了眼睛。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Oh, how embarrassing! My Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}, I apologise for offending your ears!" {n}Cheeks burning with shame, Maive casts her eyes down.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “噢，这真是太让人难堪了！我很抱歉冒犯了您的耳朵，来自上界的大人！”{n}梅芙羞愧得两颊发烫，垂下了眼睛。{/n}

languages.text: «¡Oh, qué vergüenza! ¡Mi {mf|Señor|Señora} Celestial, le pido mil disculpas por ofender sus oídos!». {n}Maive agacha la cabeza con las mejillas enrojecidas por el bochorno.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Oh, how embarrassing! My Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}, I apologise for offending your ears!" {n}Cheeks burning with shame, Maive casts her eyes down.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «¡Oh, qué vergüenza! ¡Mi {mf|Señor|Señora} Celestial, le pido mil disculpas por ofender sus oídos!». {n}Maive agacha la cabeza con las mejillas enrojecidas por el bochorno.{/n}

languages.text: "Amanın, ne utanç verici! Semavi {mf|Lordumuz|Leydimiz}, kulaklarınızı rencide ettiğim için özür dilerim!" {n}Yanakları utançla kızaran Maive, gözlerini yere deviriyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Oh, how embarrassing! My Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}, I apologise for offending your ears!" {n}Cheeks burning with shame, Maive casts her eyes down.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Amanın, ne utanç verici! Semavi {mf|Lordumuz|Leydimiz}, kulaklarınızı rencide ettiğim için özür dilerim!" {n}Yanakları utançla kızaran Maive, gözlerini yere deviriyor.{/n}

languages.text: 「あぁ、なんて恥ずかしい！天の{mf|君|姫}、耳障りなことをしてしまい申し訳ございません！」{n}恥ずかしくて頬は赤くなり、メイヴは下を向く。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Oh, how embarrassing! My Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}, I apologise for offending your ears!" {n}Cheeks burning with shame, Maive casts her eyes down.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「あぁ、なんて恥ずかしい！天の{mf|君|姫}、耳障りなことをしてしまい申し訳ございません！」{n}恥ずかしくて頬は赤くなり、メイヴは下を向く。{/n}

languages.text: « Oh, comme c'est gênant ! Votre Céleste Seigneurie, pardonnez-moi d'avoir offensé vos oreilles ! »{n}Les joues rouges de honte, Maive baisse la tête.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Oh, how embarrassing! My Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}, I apologise for offending your ears!" {n}Cheeks burning with shame, Maive casts her eyes down.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Oh, comme c'est gênant ! Votre Céleste Seigneurie, pardonnez-moi d'avoir offensé vos oreilles ! »{n}Les joues rouges de honte, Maive baisse la tête.{/n}

languages.text: "Ach, wie peinlich! {mf|Mein himmlischer Herr|Meine himmlische Herrin}, verzeiht, dass ich Eure Ohren beleidigt habe!" {n}Maives Wangen brennen vor Scham, als sie den Blick senkt.{/n}
